title: The Price of Scandal
description: Lovely Neve Macleod's life is shrouded by scandal. The tabloids delight in branding her a scarlet widow, but in reality her marriage was for convenience. She's still a virgin, and a caring single stepmother—but no one wants to hear the truth.…That is, until she finds herself stranded and snowbound with brooding tycoon Severo Constanza—an unlikely savior. As the magnificent Italian comes to her rescue, he knows nothing of her salacious past—just that she's pure at present!A snow-white virgin he will delight in taking as his own!
author: Kim Lawrence
